Description.Text: Facilities Guest accommodation comprises 79 rooms. A business centre is among the facilities. Wireless internet access is available to guests. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms The accommodation features rooms with air conditioning. Amenities in all rooms include WiFi. The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment Additional services include an entertainment programme for children, offering numerous activities. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
The accommodation features rooms with air conditioning. Amenities in all rooms include WiFi. The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms.

Guest accommodation comprises 79 rooms. A business centre is among the facilities. Wireless internet access is available to guests. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel.
Additional services include an entertainment programme for children, offering numerous activities.
